titleStmt.title: Tvvo sermons preached in the parish church of St. Giles in the fields, by way of preparative upon the Articles of the Creed by VVilliam Haywood ...
titleStmt.author: Haywood, William, 1599 or 1600-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.O. for Henry Seile ...,

notesStmt.note: "Published at the request of divers the inhabitants of the said parish."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
